text: Regal Entertainment Group is an American movie theater chain. It is based in Knoxville, Tennessee. The company was founded in 1999. The movie theater chains operated by Regal are Regal Cinemas, Edwards Theatres and United Artists Theatres. == References == Category:American entertainment companies Category:Companies based in Tennessee Category:Knoxville, Tennessee Category:Movie theatres Category:1999 establishments in the United States
title: Regal Entertainment Group
